question: Select the statement which is NOT correct regarding Kalidasa:
option1: Kalidasa was a renowned Sanskrit poet and dramatist of Gupta period.
option2: He was one of the nine gems in the court of Chandragupta I.
option3: Kumarasambhavam and Ritusamhara are his two epic works.
option4: His plays and poetry are primarily based on Hindu Puranas and philosophy
answer: He was one of the nine gems in the court of Chandragupta I.
explanation: He was one of the nine gems in the court of Chandragupta II Vikramaditya.
